answers.answer: What does your diet consist of? Do you excersise frequently? Are you vegetarian? any of these things could cause this.
Have you been tested for diabetes?

im no expert but i've noticed that the more i exercise the more i get hungery and this maintains my weight.  Even when I have alot to worry about in life, I see that excersie makes me hungry.  Also resistance training is superhelpful.if your not eating is there a reason? like depression or worried about something?
Unintentional weight loss is always a huge concern.I think you should talk to your doctor again.  Whether it is physical or mental (eating disorder) it needs addressing.Talk to your doctor.

question: i am only thirteen but have seemed to have lost alot of wieght over the past coupld of months my doctor says it is not healthy but i cant do anything to stop it i have tryed so many things HELP pleasex
title: lossing too much wieght
